Macros
TTY (terminal devices)
Stratify OS » Device Interface

Detailed Description

This is the interface to accessing terminal devices. This driver is not implemented in this version.

Macros

#define I_TTY_SETATTR
 This request sets the terminal attributes.
 
#define I_TTY_GETATTR
 This request gets the terminal attributes.
